item.title: AccorHotels will be introducing a Gourmet Food & Wine Festival in Singapore in the coming year
item.description: Source: AccorHotels. Jaan was awarded a Michelin Star in the Singapore Michelin Guide 2016 and secured the 29th spot in Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants 2016. AccorHotels, the leading hotel operator in the country, is launching its first-ever Gourmet Food & Wine Festival, anticipated to be one of the most extensive events of its kind in Singapore. The festival will feature several Michelin-starred chefs. Graham Wilson, Chief Marketing & Distribution Officer for AccorHotels Asia Pacific, stated, â€œIn a city celebrated for its culinary scene, AccorHotels will bring together some of our finest chefs from around the world and showcase the immense talent of Singaporean chefs to create a food festival as lively and diverse as Singapore itself.
